sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { DollarSign, TrendingUp, Users, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; import { formatCurrency } from '../../utils/currency'; const RewardsPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const stats = [ { name: 'Current Balance', value: formatCurrency(user?.balance || 0, user?.currency), icon: DollarSign, color: 'text-green-600', bgColor: 'bg-green-100' }, { name: 'Total Earned', value: formatCurrency(user?.totalEarned || 0, user?.currency), icon: TrendingUp, color: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-blue-100' }, { name: 'Referral Earnings', value: `$${user?.referralEarnings?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}`, icon: Users, color: 'text-purple-600', bgColor: 'bg-purple-100' } ]; const withdrawalMethods = [ { id: 'paypal', name: 'PayPal', minAmount: 5, maxAmount: 1000, fee: 0, processingTime: '1-3 business days' }, { id: 'bank_transfer', name: 'Bank Transfer', minAmount: 10, maxAmount: 5000, fee: 2, processingTime: '3-5 business days' }, { id: 'crypto', name: 'Cryptocurrency', minAmount: 20, maxAmount: 10000, fee: 0, processingTime: '1-2 business days' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Rewards & Earnings

Track your earnings and withdraw your rewards

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat) => (

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Withdrawal Section */}

Withdraw Earnings

{withdrawalMethods.map((method) => (

{method.name}

Min: ${method.minAmount}

Max: ${method.maxAmount}

Fee: ${method.fee}

Processing: {method.processingTime}

))}
{/* Referral Section */}

Refer Friends & Earn

Your Referral Code: {user?.referralCode || 'ABC123'}

Share your referral code with friends and earn $1.00 for each successful referral!

${user?.referralEarnings?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

Total Referral Earnings

); }; export default RewardsPage;
